reviewText: Fabulous look at microcredit; amazing stories and wonderful inspiration. Makes me wish I had more to give to help others.

I purchased this video for my socio-environmental science class as a lead in to creating business proposals for applying for a microcredit loan.  This video was great in clearing up information that I could not adequately explain to my students.  This is the first video all year that my students have been completely enthralled in.  They were so moved by viewing the different people and how they get by with so little and the small amounts they use to make a better life for themselves and their families.

The video is about 60 minutes long, though it does not say that on the cover.
